SELECT s.STATUS as "name",nvl(sum(dsh+shz+tg+wtg+th),0) as "value" FROM ( select '待审核' status from dual union all select '审核中' status from dual union all select '通过' status from dual union all select '未通过' status from dual union all select '退回' status from dual ) s LEFT JOIN ( SELECT (case when STATUS is not null then STATUS else '待审核' end) STATUS ,sum(case when SHENHE_CODE is null then 1 else 0 end) dsh ,sum(case when STATUS = '审核中' then 1 else 0 end) shz ,sum(case when STATUS = '通过' then 1 else 0 end) tg ,sum(case when STATUS = '未通过' then 1 else 0 end) wtg ,sum(case when STATUS = '退回' then 1 else 0 end) th FROM
V_JXYJ_JXJY where 1=1
V_JXYJ_JGXM where 1=1
V_JXYJ_JGXM_CITY where 1=1
V_JXYJ_JGLW where 1=1
V_JXYJ_JCJS where 1=1
V_JXYJ_JXTD where 1=1 and TYPE = 'declare'
V_JXYJ_JXTD where 1=1 and TYPE = 'report'
and USER_ID = #{userId} GROUP BY STATUS ) t on t.status = s.STATUS GROUP BY s.STATUS
